title: Worm
description: Bethany Andrews a small town detective, gets herself mixed up with a crime family. Relocated and working with a new police department, she’s after a serial killer who seems to choose his victims at random, leaving a bizarre call sign wriggling in their hands. With time running out for the detective, she starts receiving death threats from persons unknown. Join Bethany as she attempts to catch a serial killer before her past catches up with her and it’s too late.
author: Erica S. Watson
